readable.title: 2551344688_17a12a6948
readable.content: A man with a denim hat and white beard gives a thumbs up . A man with a gray beard and denim hat gives a thumbs up sign with his hand . An old man with a white-haired beard and a blue cap gives a thumbs-up sign with his right hand . Man with white beard and glasses gives a thumbs up . The elderly man wearing the white cap is holding his thumb up .
